text: Carnival Confession () is a 1960 West German crime film directed by William Dieterle and starring Hans Söhnker, Gitty Djamal and Götz George.Bock & Bergfelder p.90 It was made by the revived UFA company and was the veteran director Dieterle's penultimate cinema film and his last in his native Germany. ==Cast== * Hans Söhnker as Panezza * Gitty Djamal as Viola * Götz George as Clemens * Friedrich Domin as Canon Henrici * Christian Wolff as Jeanmarie * Berta Drews as Frau Bäumler * Hilde Hildebrand as Mme. Guttier * Grit Boettcher as Bertel * Ursula Heyer as Rosa * Helga Schlack as Bettine * Helga Tölle as Katharina * Rainer Brandt as Ferdinand Bäumler * Herbert Tiede as Merzbecher * Wolfgang Völz * Milena von Eckhardt as Frau Panezza * Albert Bessler as Dr. Classen * Harry Engel == References == == Bibliography == * Bock, Hans-Michael & Bergfelder, Tim. The Concise Cinegraph: Encyclopaedia of German Cinema. title: Carnival Confession
